import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Offcanvas, ListGroup, Image, Row, Button, Col,} from 'react-bootstrap'; const MobileMenuDrawer = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <> {/* */} Because it’s the Earth Shop All
Our Best Sellers
Ditch the tube;
bite the Bit.
Shop Toothpaste Bits →
Buy once,
refill forever.
Shop Deodorant →
 Oral Care Body Care Sets Our Best Sellers ); }; export default MobileMenuDrawer;
